\begin{wrapfigure}[20]{r}{0.4\textwidth}
\includegraphics[width=\linewidth]{figures/nfe/nfe}
\caption{
Generation quality of shortcut forcing compared to diffusion forcing.
Shortcut forcing with only 4 sampling steps approaches the quality of diffusion forcing with 64 steps, resulting in 16$\times$ faster generations.
}
\label{fig:nfe}
\end{wrapfigure}
